data.name: Beta Ray Bill
data.description: An adopted son of Asgard, Beta Ray Bill shows his enemies Stormbreaker's might by calling down lightning upon them and acting as a shield for his allies.

starItems.name: Beta Ray Bill
starItems.description: An adopted son of Asgard, Beta Ray Bill shows his enemies Stormbreaker's might by calling down lightning upon them and acting as a shield for his allies.

1.description:
Attack primary target and all enemies in that character's row for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be blocked by enemies with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> or <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist and has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target and all enemies in that character's row for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be blocked by enemies with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> or <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist and has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> extra Damage against enemies with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> or <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>

3.description:
Attack primary target and all enemies in that character's row for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage against targets with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> or <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked by enemies with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> or <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist and has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy

4.description:
Attack primary target and all enemies in that character's row for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage against targets with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> or <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

Gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy.

This attack cannot be blocked by enemies with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> or <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist and has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> extra Damage against enemies with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> or <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>

5.description:
Attack primary target and all enemies in that character's row for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>35%</color> Damage against targets with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> or <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

Gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy.

This attack cannot be blocked by enemies with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> or <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist and has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> on primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target and all enemies in that character's row for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>35%</color> Damage against targets with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> or <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.
Flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> on each target.
Gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy.

This attack cannot be blocked by enemies with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> or <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist and has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>15%</color> extra Damage against enemies with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> or <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target and all enemies in that character's row for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage against targets with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> or <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.
Flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> on each target.
Gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy.

This attack cannot be blocked by enemies with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> or <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist and has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> allies

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> allies

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to primary target.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> allies.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> allies

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to primary target.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> allies.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Always apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>420%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to primary target.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> allies.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> allies, this attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> extra Damage.

This attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all targets
Flip a random positive effect to <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on each enemy

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + flip a random positive effect to <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on each enemy.

If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> allies, this attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> extra Damage.

This attack cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all targets
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on each enemy

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects to <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on each enemy.

If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> allies, this attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> extra Damage.

This attack cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all targets
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> additional damage per positive effect on self

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> damage per positive effect on self. Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects to <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on each enemy.

If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> allies, this attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> extra Damage.

This attack cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all targets
Flip all positive effects to <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on each enemy

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> damage per positive effect on self. Flip all positive effects to <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on each enemy.

If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> allies, this attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> extra Damage.

This attack cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to all targets
+<color=#86e619>15%</color> additional damage per positive effect on self

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>420%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> damage per positive effect on self. Flip all positive effects to <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on each enemy.

If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> allies, this attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> extra Damage.

This attack cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to all targets
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> additional damage per positive effect on self

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>500%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage per positive effect on self.
Flip all positive effects to <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on each enemy.

If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> allies, this attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> extra Damage.

This attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health per non-minion <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> ally.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, if this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + heal for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When an ally Vahl drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, heal self for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health + gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Armor
<color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Armor

2.description:
On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health per non-minion <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> ally.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, if this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + heal for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When an ally Vahl drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, heal self for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health + gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Armor.
<color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Armor.
2.nextUpgrade: On Spawn, apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies

3.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> allies.

On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health per non-minion <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> ally.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, if this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + heal for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When an ally Vahl drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, heal self for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health + gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Armor.
<color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Armor
3.nextUpgrade: On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies

4.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, and <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> allies.

On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health per non-minion <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> ally.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, if this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + heal for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When an ally Vahl drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, heal self for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health + gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Armor.
<color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Armor.
4.nextUpgrade:
On self or ally Crit, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>
On any character's Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack the enemy with the highest Health for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to that character, and lose <color=#86e619>4</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>

5.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, and <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> allies.

On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health per non-minion <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> ally.

On self or ally Crit, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On any character's Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack the enemy with the highest Health for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to that character, and lose <color=#86e619>4</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, if this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + heal for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When an ally Vahl drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, heal self for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health + gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Armor.
<color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Armor.
